One more thing, Rintarou and Mitsu's son Yoshijiro married Genzaburou's nie=
ce!

--- In SHQ@yahoogroups.com, Linda Larsson <enma_o@...> wrote:
>
> 
> 
=
> Hirotada Tokugawa <patriot014@...> wrote:
> Was just looking through "An =
Illustrated Guide to Shinsengumi," by Nakami 
> Toshio. Turns out that Mits=
u's husband (Inoue) Rintarou, -was- indeed 
> related to Inoue Genzaburou (=
not sure how, though). Also, Okita and Mitsu's 
> father, Katsujirou, was a=
 foot soldier captain (ashigaru kogashira) 
> stationed at the lower mansio=
n (shimo-yashiki) of the Shirakawa clan, in 
> Edo. Souji was also born in =
Edo.
> 
> Thanks! (bounces) Must tell my friend... she's really into Souji =
and this has been one of 
her pet peeves. She says there's a village named =
Shirokawa near Edo, and another in 
Aizu... but if it's the Shirokawa *clan=
* involved, we've been barking up the wrong tree 
altogether.
> 
>
